alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Clay; Union; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 07 at 3:57AM MDT until October 07 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. * WHERE...In Iowa, Sioux County. In Nebraska, Dixon County. In South Dakota, Bon Homme, Yankton, Clay and Union Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
